item.title: White House says it ignores journalists who use pronouns in email bios
item.description: The Trump administration’s top spokesperson said such reporters don’t care about the truth and “cannot be trusted to write an honest story.”

item.title: Whitmer stands out from Democrats as she addresses Trump’s tariffs
item.description: The Michigan governor, a potential presidential candidate, signaled Wednesday that she sees some common ground with Trump on his trade vision.
